name: GRAPSHOT
description:
The download file is above and at the bottom of the page. Download instructions: Look at the file and click install, then extract the zip file and double click on the file called "Grapshot.exe" if you want easier access to the game you can right-click on "Grapshot.exe" and create a shortcut, then drag the shortcut to your desktop!


Battle in a randomly generated mountain with different biomes every few levels to make gameplay new and fresh every moment. Expect many areas and bosses with dozens of enemies and power-ups with a few secrets scattered around. There are also quests to complete which award you with cosmetics which you can also buy with in-game currency obtained by battling enemies.

The Corruption has found its way into the mountain and found its home at the bottom of the mountain, you must get there before he overpowers all organisms. Being the strongest living thing on the enemy side of the Corruption it is your job to make things right.
